table.name: vtiger_apdalm
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_apdalm` (`apdalmid` int(11) NOT NULL, `apdalmno` varchar(100) default NULL, `apdalm_tks_apoderado` varchar(100) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_alumno` varchar(100) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_estado` varchar(100) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_tipodevinculo` varchar(100) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_nrodocumentoapodera` varchar(20) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_codigoalumno` varchar(30) default NULL ,`apdalm_tks_ano` int(11) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`apdalmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_apdalmcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_apdalmcf` (`apdalmid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`apdalmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
